name: Paprika Chicken with Mushrooms
author: MARLANA ADAMEK
summary: There's something about chicken with paprika that is soooo good! Cooking this dish covered makes a nice mushroom sauce that can be spooned over the chicken for serving.
directions: Pound chicken breasts to 1/2 inch thickness
Sprinkle both sides of each chicken breast liberally with paprika, salt, pepper, and garlic powder
In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat
Arrange chicken breasts in the pan, cover, and cook for 10 minutes
Turn chicken breasts over, and layer the thinly sliced onions and mushrooms on top of the chicken
Remove lid, and mix onions and mushrooms into the butter sauce
Reduce heat to low, and cook uncovered for 5 minutes
